Mr. DeSAULNIER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the  extraordinary career of San Ramon, California, Police Chief Denton  Carlson as he retires after 27 years of service.

Chief Carlson began his law enforcement career in 1998 and later  joined the San Ramon Police Department during its founding in 2007.…

My friend Marlys Carlson of Stratford, IA, finished her battle with  lung cancer in July of this year and is now with her Lord and Savior. I  want to raise awareness for lung cancer in her honor today.
